title: Unified User Input Schema for Biochar Project Evaluation

feedstock.description: Information about the feedstock used in biochar production.

moisture_content.description: Percentage of water in the feedstock before processing.

sustainability_compliance.description: Details about sustainability compliance of the feedstock.

certification.description: Certification type or evidence of sustainability compliance.

origin.description: Source of the feedstock (e.g., farm, forest, urban waste).

geography.description: ISO Alpha-2 country code where the feedstock was sourced.

production_process.description: Details about the production process used to create biochar.

production_temperature.description: Operating temperature of the production system in Celsius.

energy_source.description: Primary energy source used during production (e.g., renewable, fossil-based).

process_emissions_control.description: Indicates whether emissions control systems (e.g., methane capture) are in place.

biochar_properties.description: Properties of the resulting biochar product.

organic_carbon_content.description: Percentage of organic carbon in the biochar on a dry weight basis.

ash_content.description: Percentage of ash content in the biochar.

biochar_application.description: Information about the application of the biochar product.

application_type.description: The type of application where the biochar is used.

co_benefits.description: Details about the co-benefits achieved by the project.

soil_improvement.description: Indicates whether the project improves soil properties.

biodiversity.description: Indicates whether the project enhances biodiversity.

lifecycle_emissions.description: Data related to emissions throughout the biochar production lifecycle.

baseline_emission_evidence.description: Optional evidence for non-zero baseline emissions, such as scientific studies or lifecycle assessments. Null indicates default methodology assumptions will be used.

pre_treatment.description: Emissions from feedstock pre-treatment in tonnes CO2e.

fugitive_emissions.description: Optional: Potential fugitive emissions from storage or handling in tonnes CO2e.

transportation_emissions.description: Emissions from transporting feedstock or biochar in tonnes CO2e.

transport_mode.description: Mode of transportation for feedstock or biochar. This field is open for user-defined values.
